header.rec_loc: Speakers bedroom in university halls, Lancaster University
header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: ANON and ANON are talking in the kitchen, ANON is cooking Toad in the Hole for herself, ANON is helping and advising her. Talk about food, cooking, ANONâ€™s date.
